name: Retro Shooter Prototype
description:
What is this?:

I'm working on a Retro FPS and I'm hoping to get feedback on the gameplay feel. And potential bugs I've missed. 

There are 2 test levels. One is a traditional test level with some greyboxes, the other is proof of concept level using a inversed planet as the foundation.

Sound Warning: Currently in the process of implementing FMOD so there's no volume control yet, sorry.

Visuals Warning: Programmer Art present, brace your eye's for placeholder props.

Controls:
  • WASD to Move - Hold 2 Movement directions while in the air to build up air speed.
  • Shift to Toggle Walk
  • E  to Interact with doors and switches
  • Control to Crouch
  • Space to Jump
  • 1 - 9 switch weapons. Some weapons haven't been developed yet. Most will be revamped later on.

Esc to pause.

Textures and Sound effects are all placeholder assets and will be replaced.
